flawed_nl_solution:
1/3rd of the workers before the new hires were women because 1 - (2/3) = 1/3
There were 30 women working for the company before the new hires
There are now 40 women working for the company because 30 + 10 = <<30+10=40>>40
There are 70 people working for the company because 90 + 10 = <<90+10=70>>70
The proportion of women working in the company is 4/7 because 40 / 70 = <<40/70=4/7>>4/7
The percentage of women working in the company is now 400/7 because 4/7 x 100 = <<4/7*100=400/7>>400/7
#### 400/7

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 70. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
